eventScripts.script:
ValuePath = "[.]Fault_Reset"
	Value = system.tag.readBlocking([ValuePath])[0].value
	
	if Value == 1:
	
		server = "Ignition OPC UA Server"
	
		UDT_Name = "[.]DCA_Num"
		path1 ="ns=1;s=[DCA"
		path2 = system.tag.readBlocking([UDT_Name])[0].value
		path3 ="]1.HR53904"
		addr = path1 + str(path2) + path3
		
		newvalue = 1
		system.opc.writeValue(server,addr,newvalue)
	
		Path = "[.]Fault_Reset"
		system.tag.write(Path,0)

tags.name: OverAll_Capacity
tags.Description: Also Know as Maximum Operating capacity

eventScripts.script:
ValuePath = "[.]Bus_V_Band_Hi"
	Value = system.tag.readBlocking([ValuePath])[0].value
	Value = Value * 10
	
	server = "Ignition OPC UA Server"
	
	UDT_Name = "[.]DCA_Num"
	path1 ="ns=1;s=[DCA"
	path2 = system.tag.readBlocking([UDT_Name])[0].value
	path3 ="]1.HR53620"
	addr = path1 + str(path2) + path3
		
	system.opc.writeValue(server,addr,Value)

ValuePath = "[.]Bus_V_Band_Lw"
	Value = system.tag.readBlocking([ValuePath])[0].value
	Value = Value * 10
	
	server = "Ignition OPC UA Server"
	
	UDT_Name = "[.]DCA_Num"
	path1 ="ns=1;s=[DCA"
	path2 = system.tag.readBlocking([UDT_Name])[0].value
	path3 ="]1.HR53619"
	addr = path1 + str(path2) + path3
		
	system.opc.writeValue(server,addr,Value)

ValuePath = "[.]Start"
	Value = system.tag.readBlocking([ValuePath])[0].value
	
	if Value == 1:
	
		server = "Ignition OPC UA Server"
	
		UDT_Name = "[.]DCA_Num"
		path1 ="ns=1;s=[DCA"
		path2 = system.tag.readBlocking([UDT_Name])[0].value
		path3 ="]1.HR53901"
		addr = path1 + str(path2) + path3
		
		newvalue = 1
		system.opc.writeValue(server,addr,newvalue)
	
		Path = "[.]Start"
		system.tag.write(Path,0)

ValuePath = "[.]Stop"
	Value = system.tag.readBlocking([ValuePath])[0].value
	
	if Value == 1:
	
		
		server = "Ignition OPC UA Server"
	
		UDT_Name = "[.]DCA_Num"
		path1 ="ns=1;s=[DCA"
		path2 = system.tag.readBlocking([UDT_Name])[0].value
		path3 ="]1.HR53902"
		addr = path1 + str(path2) + path3
		
		newvalue = 1
		
		system.opc.writeValue(server,addr,newvalue)
		
	
	
		Path = "[.]Stop"
		system.tag.write(Path,0)

ValuePath = "[.]kW_Cmd"
	Value = system.tag.readBlocking([ValuePath])[0].value
	
	
	server = "Ignition OPC UA Server"

	UDT_Name = "[.]DCA_Num"
	path1 ="ns=1;s=[DCA"
	path2 = system.tag.readBlocking(["[.]UDT_Num"])[0].value
	path3 ="]1.HR53623"
	addr = path1 + str(path2) + path3
	Value = Value * 10

	system.opc.writeValue(server,addr,Value)
